page.title: 11RELIGION IN S.HARRIS
page.content: Although the population is small there are{3}different churches _{ {The Church of Scotland {The Free Church {The Free Presbyterian Church _ the latter being the dominant one. Services are held morning and evening on Sunday and a prayer meeting is held one evening per week.Communion services are held in each congretation twice a year with services beginning on Thursday,which is locally called a Fast Day, through till Monday. The {Episcopalian}congregation have a service every Sunday but no resident minister.Once a year they have a communion service in the recently restored church on the uninhabited island of {Ensay}in the Sound of Harris.
